page.title: 14Tourism in Aboyne
page.content: {Tourism:} Aboyne is an ideal centre for holiday visitors, offering a variety of outdoor{sports}pursuits, such as water ski_ing, golf, hill walking on the great hills which rise around Aboyne. There are also tennis courts and there is ample opportunity for fishing on the River Dee and also on the Loch. For evening{entertainment} the Charleston Hotel has regular entertainment of Ceilidhs and local fiddlers. There are a number of hotels and restaurants where people can find refreshments and also stay. There is also an excellent fish and chip shop where people can get carry outs. For those who do not have their own{transport}there is a regular bus service to Aboyne from Aberdeen and all the other villages up the valley.
